taskbody.prereq:
A condition cannot exist outside of a conditional. The following steps assume that you have an existing conditional in the model opened in the editor.
Business Analysts should document the requirements for each condition. The Java Code property needs to be written by a technical developer so that it functions according to the Business Analysts's requirements.
taskbody.context: Perform the steps below to add a condition to a conditional.

step.cmd: Select the Conditional widget you want to extend with new condition.
Right-click the conditional, and select Add Condition.
